ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: A futuristic garden featuring massive Supertrees and conservatories filled with diverse plant life. It's perfect for families and nature lovers.

ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.attraction_name: Marina Bay Sands SkyPark Observation Deck
ATTRACTION_RECOMMENDATIONS.description: Offers breathtaking panoramic views of Singapore's skyline. Ideal for families, business travelers, and photographers.
One of the world's largest observation wheels, providing a bird's-eye view of the city. It's a must-visit for tourists seeking a unique perspective.
Combines art, science, and technology, offering immersive exhibits. A great place for cultural enthusiasts and families.
A historic hilltop park with lush greenery, ancient ruins, and scenic walking trails. Perfect for nature lovers and history buffs.
